item.title: 加拿大准备将石油管道销售推迟至 2025 年大选之后
item.description: 据熟悉内部讨论情况的官员透露，贾斯汀-特鲁多总理的政府可能会将跨山石油管道的销售推迟到 2025 年加拿大全国大选之后。【原文：Prime Minister Justin Trudeau’s government is likely to stall the sale of the Trans Mountain oil pipeline until after Canada’s national election in 2025, according to officials familiar with internal discussions.】

item.title: Mankind 委托巴克莱银行和德意志银行出资 16 亿美元进行收购
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Mankind Pharma Ltd.已选择巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）和德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）为其拟以 1,380 亿卢比（16 亿美元）收购 Bharat Serums & Vaccines Ltd.的交易安排融资。【原文：Mankind Pharma Ltd. has picked Barclays Plc and Deutsche Bank AG to help arrange financing for its proposed 138 billion rupees ($1.6 billion) acquisition of Bharat Serums & Vaccines Ltd., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会起诉安德鲁-莱福特和香橼资本卖空股票
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（Securities and Exchange Commission）起诉做空者安德鲁-莱福特（Andrew Left）和香橼资本公司（Citron Capital），称其股票交易与社交媒体帖子和研究报告有关。【原文：The Securities and Exchange Commission sued short-seller Andrew Left and Citron Capital over stock trading related to social media posts and research reports.】

item.title: 美国液化天然气为何吸引外国投资
item.description:
Woodside对Tellurian的收购凸显了出口美国天然气的吸引力。【原文：

Woodside’s acquisition of Tellurian highlights the appeal of exporting American natural gas.

】

item.title: 据说阿达尼能源公司将为 6 亿美元股票销售挑选银行
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）的输电部门已选择投资银行安排一次股票出售，这次出售可筹集至少 500 亿卢比（约合 5.97 亿美元）的资金。【原文：Gautam Adani’s power transmission unit has selected investment banks to arrange a share sale that could raise at least 50 billion rupees ($597 million), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 瑞士宝盛寻求与高盛交易以尽快获得新任首席执行官
item.description: 瑞士宝盛集团（Julius Baer Group Ltd.）正与高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Julius Baer Group Ltd. is negotiating with Goldman Sachs Group Inc. to allow Stefan Bollinger to take up his role as chief executive officer of the Swiss bank sooner than planned, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 科技股大跌导致新兴市场股市周线下跌
item.description: 新兴市场股市将出现自 5 月份以来的首次连续周度下跌，原因是科技股下跌导致投资者撤出风险资产。【原文：Emerging-market stocks are set for their first back-to-back weekly losses since May amid a technology rout that led investors to pull out of risky assets.】

item.title: 华尔街称特朗普上台可能导致油价下跌
item.description: 华尔街一些知名银行认为，美国前总统唐纳德-特朗普在大选中获胜可能会使油价走低。【原文：A US election victory for former president Donald Trump could send oil prices lower, according to some prominent Wall Street banks.】

item.title: 巴西青年农民助其篡夺美国农业霸主地位
item.description: 1990 年，父亲突然去世，布莱恩-肖姆伯格继承了家族在伊利诺伊州的农场。但当他自己在掌管农场近三十年后退休时，却没有人可以接手。【原文：When his father passed away suddenly in 1990, Brian Schaumburg inherited his family’s Illinois farm. But when he himself went to retire after almost three decades at the helm, there was nobody around to step in.】

item.title: 华尔街区块链先驱为加密货币的灰色地带纠结不已
item.description: 随着华尔街在现实世界资产代币化领域领先于加密货币原生参与者，主流机构面临着是否要继续推进去中心化金融灰色地带的问题。【原文：As Wall Street pulls ahead of crypto-native players in the field of tokenizing real-world assets, mainstream institutions face the question of whether to push on into the gray area of decentralized finance.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。在美联储下周召开会议之前的最后一个重要数据点，市场正在等待关键的通胀数据。与此同时，投资者一直在抢购人工智能热潮中不那么显眼的受益者，摩根大通也推出了自己的人工智能工具。在巴黎，火车在奥运会开幕前几个小时遭到破坏。【原文：Good morning. The tech-led stock rout is taking a pause as markets await key inflation data — the last big data point before the Federal Reserve meets next week. Meanwhile investors have been snapping up less-obvious beneficiaries of the AI boom and JPMorgan has launched its own AI tool. In Paris, trains have been hit by sabotage hours ahead of the Olympic kick-off.】

item.title: 通胀加速阻碍宽松政策，俄罗斯选择大幅加息
item.description: 俄罗斯中央银行今年首次提高了利率，因为六个月的物价加速增长迫使政策制定者放弃了下半年开始放松政策的计划。【原文：Russia’s central bank raised interest rates for the first time this year, as six months of acceleration in price growth forced policymakers to pivot from plans to start easing in the second half of the year.】

item.title: 台湾央行会议纪要显示对通胀和住房问题的争论
item.description: 台湾中央银行可能会在一段时间内保持相对紧缩的货币政策，其最近一次政策会议的记录显示，该行就通胀前景和炽热的房地产市场展开了辩论。【原文：Taiwan’s central bank may keep monetary policy relatively tight for some time, with the minutes of its latest policy meeting showing a debate over the outlook for inflation and the heated housing market.】

item.title: 肯尼亚开始出售债券，先令两周来首次上涨
item.description: 肯尼亚先令创下八周来最大涨幅，因为这个东非国家的中央银行开始出售两笔基础设施债券，预计将促进美元流入。【原文：Kenya’s shilling gained the most in eight weeks as the East African nation’s central bank began a sale of two infrastructure bonds expected to boost dollar inflows.】

item.title: 交易员等待 PCE 报告，债券市场波动性减弱
item.description: 在一波三折的疲软交易之后，美国国债在关键的美国通胀数据公布前企稳，该数据将为市场确定方向。【原文：US Treasuries steadied ahead of a key US inflation reading that will set the direction for markets after a choppy weak of trading.】

item.title: 美国银行称经济降温将进一步削弱大型科技公司的涨势
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）的迈克尔-哈特奈特（Michael Hartnett）认为，如果美国经济继续降温，美国最大科技股的涨势有可能进一步减弱。【原文：The rally in the biggest US technology stocks is at risk of fading further if the US economy continues to cool, according to Bank of America Corp.’s Michael Hartnett.】

item.title: 押注能源转型让英国安派克斯痛苦不堪
item.description:
全球最大的专注于可持续发展的上市交易基金管理公司报告称，2024 年上半年其资金流出量创下历史之最。【原文：

The world’s largest publicly traded fund manager that focuses on sustainability reported its largest-ever outflows in the first half of 2024.

】

item.title: 顶级经纪人介绍迈阿密蓬勃发展的超豪华住宅市场
item.description:
巨富们的房地产。【原文：

Real estate for the mega-rich.

】

item.title: 欧洲央行称 6 月份消费者通胀预期保持稳定
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank —）的数据显示，欧元区消费者的通胀预期自1月份以来首次出现放缓；这凸显了要使物价增长回到2%的目标仍面临的挑战之一。【原文：Inflation expectations of consumers in the euro area failed to moderate for the first time since January, according to the European Central Bank — highlighting one of the remaining challenges in bringing price growth back to the 2% target.】

item.title: 匈牙利寻求在 9 月前结束卢克石油公司争端以避免燃料风险
item.description: 负责总理办公室的政府部长表示，匈牙利必须在 9 月之前解决与乌克兰在俄罗斯主要石油供应商原油转运问题上的争端，否则将导致燃料短缺。【原文：Hungary has until September to resolve a dispute with Ukraine over the transit of crude from a major Russian oil supplier before fuel shortages set in, according to the government minister in charge of the prime minister’s office.】

item.title: 供应风险大于令人失望的需求，欧洲天然气价格上涨
item.description: 欧洲天然气价格上涨，表明在燃料需求持续疲软的情况下，市场平衡依然脆弱。【原文：European natural gas prices rose, signaling the market balance remains fragile even as demand for the fuel is persistently weak.】

item.title: 啤酒商受欧元提振，汽车制造商萎靡不振：欧洲、中东和非洲地区未来一周财报
item.description: 充满运动气息的夏季将为啤酒巨头喜力啤酒公司（Heineken NV）和安海斯-布希啤酒公司（Anheuser-Busch Inbev）带来急需的动力。【原文：A sports-filled summer should give brewing giants Heineken NV and Anheuser-Busch Inbev a much-needed boost.】

item.title: 中国考虑将高频交易商收费提高十倍
item.description: 中国正在考虑对高频交易加收至少十倍的费用，这是中国最近一次试图控制一些被监管机构视为威胁以散户投资者为主的中国股市公平性的量化策略。【原文：China is considering a fee hike of at least tenfold on high-frequency trading, its latest attempt to rein in some quantitative strategies deemed by regulators as a threat to fairness in the nation’s retail investor-dominated stock market.】

item.title: 朱庇特公司 34 亿英镑资金外流与明星经理人退出有关
item.description: 茱比特基金管理公司（Jupiter Fund Management Plc）报告称，今年上半年资金净流出 34 亿英镑（44 亿美元），因为该公司正在努力解决旗下一位明星经理人离职的问题。【原文：Jupiter Fund Management Plc reported £3.4 billion ($4.4 billion) of net outflows in the first half of the year as it grapples with the departure of one of its star managers.】

item.title: 英国生物质发电商 Drax 将向投资者返还 3 亿英镑
item.description: 英国发电商 Drax Group Plc 宣布了一项向股东返还 3 亿英镑（3.86 亿美元）的计划，并改善了全年利润前景。【原文：UK power generator Drax Group Plc announced a program to return £300 million ($386 million) to shareholders with an improved outlook for full year profits.】

item.title: 债券收益率骤降，中国蓝筹股看似物美价廉
item.description: 中国债券的反弹提升了中国受挫蓝筹股的吸引力，这要归功于后者在利率下降的环境下提高了股息支付。【原文：A rally in Chinese bonds is raising the appeal of the country’s battered bluechip stocks, thanks to the latter’s higher dividend payouts in an environment of declining interest rates.】

item.title: NatWest 上调全年收入预期，NII 超预期
item.description: 在第二季度净利息收入降幅低于分析师预期之后，NatWest Group Plc 提高了全年收入预期，这表明这家贷款巨头仍然从顽固的高利率中获得了一些好处。【原文：NatWest Group Plc boosted its forecast for full-year revenue after net interest income dropped less than analysts expected in the second quarter, a sign that the lending giant is still reaping some benefits from stubbornly high interest rates.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：富时 100 指数转势后将继续反弹
item.description: 位于伦敦金融城的伦敦证券交易所集团中庭显示股票价格信息。摄影师：克里斯-拉特克利夫/布鲁姆伯格【原文：Stock price information displayed in the London Stock Exchange Group Plc's office atrium in the City of London. Photographer: Chris Ratcliffe/Bloomberg】

item.title: 埃尼集团利润超出预期，上调全年业绩指引
item.description: 埃尼集团（Eni SpA）的上游业务表现强劲，第二季度利润好于预期，促使该公司上调了今年的业绩指导。【原文：Eni SpA’s second-quarter profit was better than expected after a strong performance at its upstream business, prompting the company to revise up its guidance for the year.】

item.title: 受中国市场影响，梅赛德斯盈利下降 28% 后下调利润率预期
item.description: 梅赛德斯-奔驰集团第二季度盈利大幅下滑 28%，原因是其电动乘用车的销量急剧下降，且中国市场需求疲软。【原文：Mercedes-Benz Group AG’s earnings plummeted 28% in the second quarter as sales of its passenger electric vehicles dropped sharply and demand in China weakened.】
